solution_line_template: Since Cristian's house has {total_rooms} rooms, he painted {green_fraction}*{total_rooms} = <<{green_fraction}*{total_rooms}={green_rooms}>>{green_rooms} rooms with green color.
The number of rooms he painted with purple is {total_rooms}-{green_rooms} = <<{total_rooms}-{green_rooms}={purple_rooms}>>{purple_rooms} rooms.
Since each room in the house has {walls_per_room} walls, the number of walls painted purple is {walls_per_room}*{purple_rooms}= <<{walls_per_room}*{purple_rooms}={purple_walls}>>{purple_walls}.
